column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We also ordered fried oysters
column3: a salad with salmon and the server (who was wonderful) highly highly recommended I get the brick chicken. Â The brick chicken was disappointing. It just tasted like any other pan fried chicken and didn't have anything special going on. I would not recommend this dish. The greens were incredibly salty and the whole dish was just lacking flavor.
